title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale modernization with agentic AI featuring Thomson Reuters (MAM334)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用代理式AI扩展现代化，汤森路透案例分享 (MAM334)
abstract: Join Thomson Reuters to discover how they leveraged agentic AI service to revolutionize their .NET modernization journey. In this session you will learn how they leveraged AWS Transform for .NET to modernize 5M lines of code monthly, achieving a 4x acceleration in development velocity. Learn how they reduced application transformation time from months to a single sprint while cutting operating costs by 30%. This session demonstrates practical implementation of parallel modernization at scale, featuring both web and IDE experiences, and shares insights on using AI-powered agents to dramatically reduce technical debt while maintaining security and performance.
abstract_cn: 加入 Thomson Reuters，了解他们如何利用代理式 AI 服务彻底改变其 .NET 现代化之旅。在本次会议中，您将了解他们如何利用 AWS Transform for .NET 每月现代化 500 万行代码，实现开发速度提升 4 倍。了解他们如何将应用程序转型时间从数月缩短至单个冲刺周期，同时将运营成本降低 30%。本次会议展示了大规模并行现代化的实际实施，涵盖 Web 和 IDE 体验，并分享了使用 AI 驱动的代理大幅减少技术债务同时保持安全性和性能的见解。
